dcterms:description: The COCO dataset is used for object detection and instance segmentation, providing a large number of images with complex scenes containing common objects in context.

dcterms:description: ImageNet is a large-scale hierarchical image database used for image classification tasks, containing millions of labeled images across thousands of categories.

dcterms:description: The Kinetics dataset is a large-scale dataset for human action recognition in videos, containing thousands of video clips across various action categories.

dcterms:description: The Cityscapes dataset is designed for semantic urban scene understanding, providing high-quality pixel-level annotations for images captured in street scenes.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes
